name: Dawn at Blacksun 01
description:
DAWN AT BLACKSUN CHAPTER 1: A GIRL WITH A TAIL

Dawn at Blacksun is a chapter-based visual novel that is read online. Through a password system, in each chapter you can load your past decisions and have a completely customizable experience! Just like a multimedia web-comic with interactive elements.

  ¡También en español! 

"This is a genesis story, starring a miracle.
Of how a new world emerges from the rebellion of those
who shouldn't have been born."

 No one told you to appear, I don't remember giving you my body to develop in it. I don't care anymore, I finally have enough determination to do justice with my own hands. If I want to see the light again, then I must get rid of it and hope not to bleed until someone comes. Nothing assures me survival, but I must take the risk.  More years of darkness await for me by succumbing to cowardice.

In this first episode of DAWN AT BLACKSUN you'll play as Andrae, a girl who was locked up in her room for three years after a tail suddenly appeared on her body. Finally, it's time to escape. Her true identity awaits.

As the girl with a tail. As the rebellious demon prince. As the stubborn angel.

As the violent nymph.
  • 40 ~ 45 minutes length. (7500 words)
  • Live2d animated sprites.
  • Animated scenes.
  • 6 CGs.
  • Original music composed by our author.
  • Demons.
  • Angels.
  • Violent nymphs.
  • IMPORTANT NOTE 1: The whole chapter size is around 110MB, you can download an .exe for windows if you prefer.
  • IMPORTANT NOTE 2: Dawn at Blacksun is translated from the spanish version, some translation mistakes are to be expected. If you want to help us, please send a mail to media@euriale.ar with the corrections that you want to contribute.
